partners.numerix: Numerix is a developer and helper. He published various addons and tutorials. Here are a few:

fork_me.title: BOT
fork_me.description: The source code for this bot is available on our GitHub account. You can contribute freely to add new features to the mTxServ bot.
fork_me.configure_explain:
To see all commands, use `m!help`. Set the main language for your server with `m!bot-lang en` or `m!bot-lang fr` in a channel.

To enable the command `m!servers` on your discord server, use `m!add-server` to configure it, in a channel.

The bot can post new articles in english or/and french, about your favorites games, in a specified channel. To configure it, use `m!feeds` in a channel.
fork_me.explain: We would be very happy to receive help from developers who can help us fix bugs or add new features.

invite.description: To invite your friends to join this this server, use this invitation link:

gs_status.invalid_format: :no_entry_sign: Invalid address, port is probably missing

help.dm_closed: Unable to send you the help DM. You probably have DMs disabled.

help.multiple_commands: Multiple commands found. Please be more specific.

software_search.check: See all our versions & modpacks on

rules.title: :loudspeaker: Rules
rules.description:
Welcome on the mTxServ community discord. It's dedicated to **mutual support between members** of the community.

:writing_hand:  The **official support** is only provided on our website, we can't verify informations about user's identity here -> <https://mtxserv.com/support/list>. No question through private message will be processed, except in case of private/sensitive information disclosure.

:writing_hand:  **Before posting any help request**, check **helpful links** channels, **pinned messages** and **tutorials** (<https://mtxserv.com/help>).

:writing_hand:  **For any help request**, post in the **relevant channel** (general __**is not the relevant channel!**__) with any useful information. At least the host (GAME-XX-XX), the server version and error log available in console (in case of crash). __***I've got a problem***__ doesn't allow to help you out!

:writing_hand:  This Discord is a **community space**: the **friendliness is important**, especially towards the other people that takes time to help you.

:writing_hand:  **Any disrespectful behavior** may be punished with a kick or a ban.

:writing_hand:  **Advertising** is **ONLY** allowed in **server-pubs** channels. Any advertisement out of these channels or through private messages = ban.

:writing_hand:  Inappropriate content (leaked addon, personal informations, inappropriate images, private conversation, etc) = ban.

support.title: :question: How to contact support
support.description: Our staff is at your disposal if need help or have a question.
support.before: Before contacting us, check the help center!

explain.title: :question: Need help
explain.description:
Post in **IN THE APPROPRIATE CHANNEL** !

To help you, **please**:
explain.rule_3: * what offer do you have (**name**, **RAM**, etc)
explain.rule_4: * **describe** your problem, and what you are using (addons, plugins, mods, etc.)
explain.rule_6: * **be patient**, we are on a community server ;)

cover.error_message: :no_entry_sign: An error occured with the generator. Try again.

login.title: :lock: Link this account with mTxServ.com account
login.sent_dm: To link your Discord account with your mTxServ account, sent `login` in **DM** to the bot.
login.description:
To link your *Discord* account with your *mTxServ.com* account in order to be able to benefit from all functionalities, you must enter your API settings.

Get your `client_id`, `client_secret` and `api_key`:
login.already_connected: You are already logged to your mTxServ account. Logout with `m!logout`.

logout.not_logged: Your discord account isn't linked with your mTxServ account.

me.logged: Your account `%name%` is linked with Discord.
me.not_logged: Your discord account isn't linked to your mTxServ account.
me.cant_fetch: Can't connect to your mTxServ account.

suggest.confirm: Thank you for your suggestion %name%! We appreciates all feedback.

ark_version.message: The latest version of **ARK servers** is `%version%`.

gca.description: Mappeur, modélisateur, graphiste, développeur ou même configurateur de serveur… Ce serveur est fait pour toi !

servers.how_to: To add your game server, m!add-server
servers.no_result_more:
__To add your server__, use the command `m!add-server`.
__You must have connected your__ mTxServ account with `m!login`, to verify use `m!me`.

server_add.not_logged:
To add your server, 
__you must have connected your__ mTxServ account with `m!login`, to verify use `m!me`.
server_add.no_result: You didn't have any game server.
server_add.sent_dm: To add you server, sent `add-server` **in DM** to the bot.
server_add.which: Which server ID do you want to add (eg: `1`)?
server_add.added: Game server added, use `m!servers` to view server status!
server_add.permissions: You must be **administrator** of this discord server to use this command.

feeds.title: Your feeds
feeds.description: To receive **news from your favorite games __in a specified channel__**, subscribe to the lists with `m!feed-add`, for example `m!feed-add minecraft IDOfChannel` (__admin only__).

achievement.new: Congratulations <@%userId%>, you have now the achievement **%role%**!

invite_ranking.description:
**Invite your friends**, try to **win prizes** every month!
The ranking is reset and the winners announced at the **end of the month**.
